00032 namespace SPK
00033 {
00034     class Particle;
00035 
00046             class SPK_PREFIX Zone : public Registerable, public Transformable
00047             {
00048             public :
00049 
00051                         // Constructor //
00053 
00058                         Zone(const Vector3D& position = Vector3D());
00059 
00061                         // Setter //
00063 
00068                         virtual inline void setPosition(const Vector3D& v);
00069 
00071                         // Getters //
00073 
00078                         inline const Vector3D& getPosition() const;
00079 
00085                         inline const Vector3D& getTransformedPosition() const;
00086 
00088                         // Interface //
00090 
00096                         virtual void generatePosition(Particle& particle,bool full) const = 0;
00097 
00103                         virtual bool contains(const Vector3D& point) const = 0;
00104 
00117                         virtual bool intersects(const Vector3D& v0,const Vector3D& v1,Vector3D* intersection,Vector3D* normal) const = 0;
00118 
00124                         virtual void moveAtBorder(Vector3D& point,bool inside) const = 0;
00125 
00132                         virtual Vector3D computeNormal(const Vector3D& point) const = 0;
00133 
00134             protected :
00135 
00137                         static const float APPROXIMATION_VALUE;
00138 
00148                         static inline void normalizeOrRandomize(Vector3D& v);
00149 
00150                         virtual inline void innerUpdateTransform();
00151 
00152             private :
00153 
00154                         Vector3D position;
00155                         Vector3D tPosition; // transformed position
00156             };
00157 
00158 
00159             inline void Zone::setPosition(const Vector3D& v)
00160             {
00161                         position = tPosition = v;
00162                         notifyForUpdate();
00163             }
00164 
00165             inline const Vector3D& Zone::getPosition() const
00166             {
00167                         return position;
00168             }
00169 
00170             inline const Vector3D& Zone::getTransformedPosition() const
00171             {
00172                         return tPosition;
00173             }
00174 
00175             inline void Zone::normalizeOrRandomize(Vector3D& v)
00176             {
00177                         while(!v.normalize())
00178                         {
00179                                     do v = Vector3D(random(-1.0f,1.0f),random(-1.0f,1.0f),random(-1.0f,1.0f));
00180                                     while (v.getSqrNorm() > 1.0f);
00181                         }
00182             }
00183 
00184             inline void Zone::innerUpdateTransform()
00185             {
00186                         transformPos(tPosition,position);
00187             }
00188 }
